ROM.Changelog:
19.0 (Final Nougat Build):-
- October Security Patch Merged
Legend Settings: - Added toggle to Disable media art on Lockscreen - Added toggle to hide alarm, date and clock on Lockscreen - Added toggle to hide the Auto brightness icon in brightness slider
Prebuilt: - Updated Magisk to 14.0 - Updated Lawnchair
Other Stuff: - Added ColorEngine - Added bootup Boost - Added Mirror Selfie option in Snap Camera - Removed Inbuilt Dark Theme - Synced with Latest Lineage - Kernel Updated to velvet
